testcase.name: Successfully submitting the form for Test Engineer position
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to the 2NTECH HR page........................................passed When fill out the first step of the form with valid information.............passed And select "position" from the position.....................................passed And submit the form.........................................................passed Then should see a success message confirming the form submission............passed

testcase.name: Verify main page and navigation functionalities
testcase.system-out: Given the user navigates to the 2NHaber homepage............................passed Then clicks company logo should be redirected to the homepage...............passed And clicks the dropdown menu for each navbar link should be accessible......passed Then toggles the dark-light mode button the page theme should switch accordingly.passed Then clicks on the search button the search popup should be displayed.......passed Then clicks on the hamburger menu button the hamburger menu should be displayed.passed
